name: CITROEN BERLINGO MULTISPACE
snippet: The original and a nice minivan was important updates.

name: CITROEN C3 PICASSO

name: CITROEN C4 CACTUS
snippet: Citroen C4 Cactus filled with modern technologies, which stand guard over the safety and comfort, will be useful in the daily commute and help in difficult situations.

name: CITROEN C4

name: CITROEN C4 PICASSO
snippet: Citroen C4 Picasso - a compact but spacious minivan.

name: CITROEN C-ELYSEE
snippet: Citroen C-Elysee embodies all the technical and stylistic developments Stamps.

name: CITROEN GRAND C4 PICASSO
snippet: Citroen Grand C4 Picasso is striking a balance between soft, wavy lines and a spacious, convenient interior.

name: DS 4 CROSSBACK
snippet: DS 4 Crossback, the true DNA of the brand carrier, different off-road look and promises an interesting and memorable trip.
